learning.unsupervised.outliers

Class LocalOutlierFactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.unsupervised.outliers.OutlierDetector
      • learning.unsupervised.outliers.LocalOutlierFactor

  • public class LocalOutlierFactor
extends OutlierDetector
    This class implements the algorithm first described in 2000 in a paper by Markus M. Breunig, Hans-Peter Kriegel, Raymond T. Ng and JÃ¶rg Sander titled 'LOF: Identifying Density-Based Local Outliers' that was presented at the ACM SIGMOD conference. A local outlier factor is defined as a ratio between the local reachability density in the point of interest and the average reachability density of its neighbor points.
